General.Name: Victory Giant Technology Huizhou Co Ltd
General.Description: Victory Giant Technology (HuiZhou)Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of high-precision printed circuit boards in China. The company offers server motherboards, gold finger boards, automotive electronic control devices, server boards, and LED photoelectric boards, as well as Netcom, power supply, and industrial products. Its products have applications in computer and peripherals, network communication, automotive and consumer electronics, power supply, industry control, servers, medical devices, aerospace equipment, etc. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Huizhou, China.
